attributes.action: Cycle Safety Campaign "Lets actually look out for each other" and not just put it on a DfT website
attributes.additional_details:
I asked the Think Campaign Team for over two years for a Cycle Safety Think Campaign, first it was No they cant afford it, then they said they were looking for a way to fund it, then they said one is due in the Autumn (2012) and what happened it went straight on a DfT website when it should be in the faces of Road Users, while ever its out of sight its out of mind and I dont believe the DfT are doing enough to support Cycling for the Masses for all the talk


Demand an advertising campaign for "Lets look out for each other" get it off a DfT website and in the faces of road users
